Name: De Tropen
Review Text:
The restaurant looks very nice, and it's conveniently located in the museum.

The food is alright, portions are quite small. No vegan option but a couple of vegetarian ones.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: De Tropen is a perfect spot for a coffee(meeting) in the morning, a delicious lunch or dinner. The interior is impressive and the terrace has a great view over the Oosterpark. It's very easy to access through station Muiderpoort if you are from out of town.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Nice ambience, but sloppy service, disappointing menu and bad coffee (mini cappuccino). Waited 30 minutes for a croissant that did not arrive after all.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text:
Great quality but limited choices for coeliacs.

Just tucking into a very tasty sweet potato salad as I type... ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Good food, lots of vegetarian options. Great staff! Also dogfriendly.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: A restaurant worthy of it's own entrance at Tropenmuseum with well designed interior and outdoor seating. Menu offers enough choices to calm every tummy grumble, whether a 4-year old daughter or tired parent.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Very nice ambiance and attentive staff. Best seats are on the terrace.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Decent food, nicely decorated. We went there after a visit to the museum. You can enter via the museum and we were seated promptly. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Top spot for dancing during their Kick70 70&80 disco dance event. Music for body & soul. Bring ear protectors.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Nice spot to take a break during the day but also to have a snack or full meal when taking a break from the Tropen museum. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Nice cafe/bar/restaurant. It's very child friendly as it has a kids area behind the bar. Inside it's a bit dark but it has quite a big terrace outside. It was not very busy when I visited it around 11:00 which was nice. The staff was kind and helpful as well. I'll probb return here in the near future.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Second time for me during Lazy Sunday, this time with a Jazz DJ, singer and fluteplayer. Very relaxed atmosphere, friendly staff. However, there was one waitress who did not understand at all what I was asking and returned to me with items ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Beautiful ambiance and decor, friendly customer service but cannot stress the ridiculousness of their timing. My friend and I dined there around 2 pm which was quite full for this time. Understandably, it's going to take a while for your ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Incredible place with food from many different cultures. Would recommend regardless of whether you are visiting the museum. It is a fantastic concept that should be expanded elsewhere as well.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Beautiful museum space, very nice coffee place with delicious food and impecable service. It's a very good spot where to sit on the terrace during summer times. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Restaurant De Tropen can be accessed from within the Tropenmuseum. But you can also access it from the outside if you are not visiting the museum. The lunch food is a healthy Indonesian fusion cuisine. Service was quick and friendly.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: It is a lovely Cafe, beside the beautiful gardens of Tropen Concert Hall and the Ooster Park. Very peaceful atmosphere and clean.  Birds sing and you have a great view of old historical building of Tropen Institute (KIT).

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: A hidden secret: not far away from City center and soooo relaxed. And green: located in the Oosterpark. Beautiful historical building (back entrance of Tropenmuseum). Moreover: they serve excellent pok√© bowls üëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: With beatiful terras(in spring/summer stunning view-very green. But inside also beatiful.Wide kids menu is huge plus too. Food good.Service also fine.Located opposite a pool for kids in the park.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Good food, great atmosphere, great for families with kids.  They have a decent play area and are right next to Oosterpark.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Undergo this experiential space offering some spectacular exhibitions but also a few that are predictable, still it's a unique and interesting museum with its own impressive style of presentation.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Great historical location with a great view. Delicious food and great service. Would recommend this place to everyone.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Waited about 40 Minutes to get a Fanta and Cappuccino, which we didn't even get in the end.

Name: De Tropen
Review Text: Nice atmosphere with good bites. Kids selections could be a little wider.
